parameter.name: PhotoSharingDB-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: PhotoSharingDB Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Server=tcp:{Your Azure Database URL},1433;Database=PhotoSharingDB;User ID={Your ID Here};Password=Pa$$w0rd;Trusted_Connection=False;Encrypt=True;Connection Timeout=30;PersistSecurityInfo=true

parameter.name: AzureAppServices-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: AzureAppServices Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: PhotoSharingApplication.Models.PhotoSharingContext-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: PhotoSharingApplication.Models.PhotoSharingContext Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
